ALERT READ ME

EVERYTHING IS SUBJECT TO CHANGE!

cool thing that you can do? end it with [POG]
guide? end it with [GUIDE]
request for something in the game? end it with [REQUEST]
nothing in this list? dont end it with anything, just put it a normal name
